Name: Livingstone
Ingredients: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: The classic gin and vermouth Dry Martini made not so dry and a tad more approachable by a splash of sugar.
History: This vintage cocktail is named after Doctor Livingstone, the famous African missionary.
Nutrition: One serving of Livingstone contains 184 calories
